thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 3 of 1678
thread.title: Arnab

author: Arnab
title: Arnab
text: I had a horrible experience trying to change my return flight date Kolkata to Toronto. The customer service rep Ashley kept me on hold for hours while manually calculating the fare. She initially told me I would need to pay CAD 489 for a change of return date, and after I gave my credit card details, she got back saying that she had made a mistake and actual fare was CAD 735!!!, which is almost the price of a new one way ticket! I wanted to speak to a supervisor and she put me on hold for ages before the line got connected to a voice message from China Airlines! Horrible service. I will never use Flighthub again and urge my friends not to use them either.
